title: Albions triumph Personated in a maske at court. By the Kings Maiestie and his lords. The Sunday after Twelfe Night. 1631
author: Townshend, Aurelian, fl. 1601-1643.
publisher: Printed by Aug: Mathewes for Robert Allet [i.e. Allot] at the Blacke Beare in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: The play was performed on 8 Jan. 1632.
A variant, probably earlier (STC 24155a), is anonymous.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
